patthana18.7:4.1: Hetuṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.7:5.1: Nahetuṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.7:6.1: Nahetuṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:7.1: Hetuṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:8.1: Hetuṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:9.1: Nahetuṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:10.1: Hetuṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:10.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.7:11.1: Nahetuṃ cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nacittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:11.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.7:12.1: Hetuṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:12.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.7:13.1: Nahetuṃ cittavisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nacittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:13.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.7:14.1: Hetuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:15.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:16.1: Hetuṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:17.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:18.1: Hetuṃ cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:19.1: Nahetuṃ nocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:20.1: Hetuṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:21.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:22.1: Hetuṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:23.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:24.1: Hetuṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.7:25.1: Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
